question: Which among the following statement is correct?
option1: Both Melting point & Boiling Point of Heavy water are higher than normal water
option2: Both Melting point & Boiling Point of Heavy water are lower than normal water
option3: Melting point is higher and Boiling Point is lower than normal water
option4: Melting point is lower and Boiling Point is higher than normal water
answer: Both Melting point & Boiling Point of Heavy water are higher than normal water
